item.title: The Future of Remote Work
item.author: mikeyparker@gmail.com (Mike Parker)
item.description: An in-depth conversation with Darcy Barnes, founder of Distributed Teams Inc. and author of “Remote Revolution”. We explore how the pandemic permanently shifted workplace paradigms and what organizations must do to thrive in this new environment.

item.title: Synthetic Biology: The Next Computing Platform
item.author: mikeyparker@gmail.com (Mike Parker)
item.description: Dr. Elena Ruiz explains how advances in genomic engineering are creating a new technological paradigm where biology becomes programmable. We discuss both the incredible opportunities and ethical challenges that arise when cells become the new semiconductors.

item.title: The New Space Economy
item.author: mikeyparker@gmail.com (Mike Parker)
item.description: A conversation with Sarah Chen, former SpaceX engineer and founder of Lunar Resources Corporation. We discuss the rapidly evolving commercial space industry, from low Earth orbit to lunar mining, and how the next decade will transform our relationship with space.
